title: SAMSUNG Galaxy J Max 1.5 GB RAM 8 GB ROM 7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Gold)

product_specification.Additional Features: Ultra Data Saving Mode, S-Bike, Wi-Fi Direct, PC Sync: Smart Switch (PC Version), FM Stereo
product_specification.USP: Android v5.1 (Lollipop) OS, 8 MP Primary Camera, 2MP Secondary Camera, 7 inch Touchscreen
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Primary Camera: f/1.9, Auto Focus; Secondary Camera: f/2.2
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Bigger, Better: Samsung's Galaxy J Max is the ideal tablet for hardcore gamers who love playing Mortal Kombat X or movie buffs who are crazy about the classics. It's large 17.8-cm WXGA TFT screen produces rich images at a resolution of 1280x700 pixels, so you can thoroughly immerse yourself in the entertainment of your choice.
product_description.All the Power You Need: Who says you can only enjoy movie marathons on a TV? When fully charged, this tablet can operate for a duration of up to 9 hours as it comes with a powerful 4000-mAh battery. So, you can watch a few good movies at a stretch without having to recharge the battery.
product_description.Ultimate 4G Experience: If online gaming is your thing, you wouldn't want to disconnect or lag when you're playing a game while travelling. Thanks to 4G technology, you won't face such hassles on this tablet as data transfer rates are very fast on it. To go easy on your data package, you can switch on Samsung's Ultra Data Saving Mode to save up to 50% of data when you're browsing the Web.
product_description.Capture the Spectacular: If you're taking a trip around India, you can use the 8-MP rear camera to capture clear photos of scenic locations like Agra to carry its essence with you. Parties can get hazy after you've had a few drinks, though, you can always use the 2-MP front camera to capture excellent selfies of all the joyful moments to remember them in detail.
product_description.Connect the Way You Want: If you like a data package that's provided by one service provider but you prefer the call plans offered by another, you can use two SIMs on this tablet to make the best of both.
product_description.Expand Your World: If 8 GB of internal memory isn't enough for you to store your favourite videos, songs and games, you can always expand this tablet's memory by up to a whopping 200 GB. Now, you can store entire film series on your smart device knowing full well that you'll have space for other data too.
product_description.Enjoy Pure Performance: You won't experience glitches when you shift from watching a video on YouTube to checking social media updates on FB as this tablet features 1.5 GB of RAM and a 1.5-GHz quad-core processor.

review:
I don't know why people are writing such negative reviews on flipkart. The Samsung j max is a really good device and a smoothly performing one at that. Yes the camera should have been better at this price. The build quality is really good. The display is nice and ideal for movie watching. Battery backup is good. Charging it doesn't take too much time. Gaming experience is satisfactory. The tab doesn't heat up after long use. Overall it is a good product.
Susobhan Sarkar.

This product is very good for all person. 4G full speed available
Battery back up is more. HD display. Net speed very good. Flip kart is fine every time. Time delivery. Package is very good condition. Thanks to flip kart

I got this tab at Rs.8010 only in offer. Very Good Tablet for simple uses like web browsing, Microsoft office, PDF and ebook reading, watching movies and video, playing music etc. It also has reading mode for reading at night, supports Dual nano sim card and memory card too. Build quality and Screen Quality is also very Good at 216ppi which is good for a tablet of 7 inch.

The tablet also has few demerits like it takes about 3 hours to full charge because battery capacity is only 1A so it cannot support fast charging. Besides this, usable internal memory is around 3.8GB out of 8GB but considering the price of 8010 rupees, its a very good tablet from a well known brand Samsung and best in this price range. I got the best deal for this tab about 4000 rupees lower than the market price of 11,900 rupees. Thanks.

As usual samsumg gives very good performance in every aspect..
No hanging problem during heavy usage as inbuilt ultradata saving mode is provided which closes all back ground apps to clear ram...
No battery heating issue.it gives gud battery back up since 4000mah battery. Reading mode is very helpful in using it as kindle...
Screen color is little less than j7 .
But gaming performance is same as that of j7...
Camera quality much more better than 8mp camera of chinese phone..
Little annoying thing i have observed is that its cover and tempered glass are not easily available in the market if avaliable they cost it very much for less quality...

I'm very satisfied. But would have been happier with 16 GB rather than the existing 8 GB. Also would like to have the freedom to uninstall some of the pre-installed apps whether from Samsung or others. Auto refresh for weather settings should have update option for every 15 mins. too or a "Follow me" option. Bur overall very happy with the J Max. And good battery life too...

A good tablet for this price.it is not having the smoothest of UIs but is pretty responsive and does the job for me.i use this tablet to read and watch few videos .for gaming and other high power requiring work I recommend getting a more powerful tablet.overall I'm very happy with this device and I'm glad I went for Samsung over lenovo.
Product is excellent delivered in time easy to handle very very happy to have this in my wallet.Thanks Flipkart for this amazing product in such a affordable amount.
Running as desired. Not too fancy, my mom is loving the gold colour! My mom is loving it and that's what matters.

I bought it 3 months back. Tab look wise very good and when it comes to performance 1.5 gb ram is not sufficient for smooth running. Battery back up is superb . Only the problem I am facing is , I am unable install apps directly to sd card. I have to move the apps manually. This is little irritating when we installing new apps. Other than that I am very much satisfied with tab.

Absolute value for money. Few points apart from youtube reviews:
1- This device feels and is little heavy. Also its a lcd. So I bumper or back cover is a must.. In case for kids.
2- Rear Camera quality exceeded expectation. Good light ing and less less than 10 metre shots is they key.
3 - If 7-8 Apps installed its a good pick. But I would not recommend beyond this until you are an expert on andriod app tweak. I am not.
4- VoLTE speed is good. Just marginally lesser than J7.
5- Speaker is twi...

Absolute value for money. Few points apart from youtube reviews:
1- This device feels and is little heavy. Also its a lcd. So I bumper or back cover is a must.. In case for kids.
2- Rear Camera quality exceeded expectation. Good light ing and less less than 10 metre shots is they key.
3 - If 7-8 Apps installed its a good pick. But I would not recommend beyond this until you are an expert on andriod app tweak. I am not.
4- VoLTE speed is good. Just marginally lesser than J7.
5- Speaker is twice better than J7. File transfer was faster than J7 using the same cable.
6- Free blueT headset is a futher discount and is a good quality.
7- With single and double sim on - clear performance difference. I prefer to keep on single sim.

It's an amazing tablet. Though the internal memory is only 8GB but still it's too good. It's affordable and has a lot new features. I'm just like your Samsung Galaxy J7 kr any series of Samsung Galaxy J! It's a must buy product!!

This tab has disappointed me due to its touch and charging
Couple of thing i notice and want to share with you.

1. The touch of the phone is not good. Sometime you have to tap twice on sapce bar or some other key.

2. Its charging is very-very slow. After putting it into charge for 3-4 hrs barely it get charged 20-25% only.

3. The bottome back and menu button doesn't have back light. So when you use thia tab in night in absence of light, it is hard to find the back or menu key.

This phone disappointed me as brand samsung because i am using samsung from last 7 years and i blindly trust on them.

But this time not and in future it force me to think 10 times before going for samsung tab.

Hope this will help other to make their decision.
